en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner Bangkok, 16th May 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Grand Convention Hall JJ Mall Chatuchak, Bangkok on 16th May 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 1200 FE Leaders, Members, invited guests and VIPs! Among the many VIPs and celebrities who attended are FE Thailand Advisory Board Chairman, Former Army Commander Southern Thailand, General Dato Kitti Ratanacahaya, Thailand's No 1 International Supermodel and Actress Pancake- Kamanit Jamikorn, FE's Thai Spokesman and 1st Olympics Gold Medal Winner, Somrak Khumsing, well known actor Sombat Methanee and wife, well known actress Ampa Poosit, Pradaabdao Khumprewpan 'Jiant' , Singer Looktan Dansawan, Songwriter Jitakorn Buaniam, Father of Thai Jazz Methawat Thewan Sapsaengyakorn, Actor Rid Loucha, Actor and Singer Surabodin Sombatjaroen (who was MC for the night), Singer and former Senator Sod-Sai Roong-Pho-Thong.

Highlights of Event:

- FE Founder CEO Paul Ting, FE Founder Director KS Lee together with VIPs and Presidential Directors led
  into Grand Convention Hall by procession of 10 children dressed in national costumes and carrying national
  flags of 10 countries. 

- Opening Speech by FE Country Licensee Don Chan.

- Speech by FE Thailand Advisory Board Chairman, General Dato Kitti Ratanacahaya.

- Thai Traditional "Blessing Dance" performances.

- Pre Launching of "Research on Energy Drinking Water" by Professor Dr Wichit Bunyahotara PHD, 
  Former Head Chemistry Dept Chulalongkorn University, Thailand.

- Recognition and Presentation of Awards to new FE Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential
  Directors.

- Speech by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting on FE's amazing track record and on FE's culture of social
  entrepreneurism.

- Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee on how to build a successful global network.

- Speech and Testimonial by FE's Thai Spokesman and Thailand's 1st Olympics Gold Medal Winner, 
  SomrakKhamsing.

- Appearance and song performances by Thailand's No 1 International Supermodel and Top Actress,
  Pancake- Kamanit Jamikorn. Wow, the excited crowd surge to the front of the stage to take photos of
  Pancake! She is VERY popular in Thailand!

- Sharing and Testimonials by FE Thai Presidential Directors, Somsak & Petchara Thammasirimongkol,
  Paramee Meeboon, Yachada Monsathaporn. It was both touching and inspirational to hear how they made
  it to be PDs! 

- Sharing and Testimonial of Quantum Pendant by famous Thai actress Ampa Poosit.

- Karaoke Singing Contest.

- Speech and product demo by FE's dynamic Presidential Director, KC Phoon. Thank you, KC!

- Lucky Draws.

- Closing by Don Chan.

Once again, a BIG THANK YOU to FE Country Licensee Don Chan and team for a successful event. A BIG THANK YOU to all FE Leaders in Thailand for supporting the event. THANK YOU also to Actor and Singer, Surabodin Sombatjaroen for MCing for the night. FE looks forward to the next event in Bangkok in 6 weeks time, which promises to be another exciting event! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!! 
 
< Click here for more photos >
